plot: Surrounded by change, Azam, a traditional herder and Buzkashi player, tries to find his place in the new Tajikistan.
title: Buzkashi!
plot_es: Surrounded by change, Azam, a traditional herder and Buzkashi player, tries to find his place in the new Tajikistan.
plot_en: Surrounded by change, Azam, a traditional herder and Buzkashi player, tries to find his place in the new Tajikistan.
